Check data generating model
```{r}
source("dgmodel.R")
dat <- dgmodel(
    nid=60000, 
    b_gcc0=0.13,
    b_u2c0=0,
    gr_maf=0.2,
    nsnp=99,
    h2_known=0.2,
    h2_unknown=0.19,
    b_c0l=0,
    b_u2l=0,
    rsq_gr0=0,
    rsq_lr0=0.0016068,
    b_u1r0=0,
    b_u1d=0,
    b_u2d=0,
    d_prev=3/10,
    b_c0c1=1,
    b_u2c1=0,
    b_dc1=1,
    b_r0r1=1,
    b_u1r1=0,
    b_dr1=0,
    b_dx1=0.1
    ) 
print(dat)
```

Check output of dgmodel - each is expected to have a variance of 1 except prs, l as these are scaled and prob_l and d
```{r}
source("estimation.R")
dgmodel_check(dat)
```
Check associations between parameters
```{r}
source("estimation.R")
overview <- dgmodel_analysis(dat, ncase=2000, ncontrol=2000, protein_gwas=10000, prot="prot", iteration=1)
print(overview)
```
